md:
giải nghĩa từ "facility" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Facility (noun)
	* Meaning: a building or place that provides a particular service or activity
	* Vietnamese: cơ sở, hạ tầng, tiện nghi
	* Example: The hotel has a fitness facility on the top floor.
	* Related words: amenities, infrastructure, equipment

2. Facility (noun)
	* Meaning: a natural ability or talent
	* Vietnamese: khả năng, tài năng
	* Example: She has a facility for languages and can speak five fluently.
	* Related words: aptitude, skill, gift

3. Facility (noun)
	* Meaning: ease of use or performance
	* Vietnamese: sự tiện lợi, dễ sử dụng
	* Example: The new software has a facility for automatic updates.
	* Related words: convenience, usability, accessibility

Note: The meanings of "facility" can be quite different depending on the context, so it's essential to understand the nuances of each definition to use the word correctly.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "facility" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  1. Facility (noun)

    • Meaning: a building or place that provides a particular service or activity
    • Vietnamese: cơ sở, hạ tầng, tiện nghi
    • Example: The hotel has a fitness facility on the top floor.
    • Related words: amenities, infrastructure, equipment

  2. Facility (noun)

    • Meaning: a natural ability or talent
    • Vietnamese: khả năng, tài năng
    • Example: She has a facility for languages and can speak five fluently.
    • Related words: aptitude, skill, gift

  3. Facility (noun)

    • Meaning: ease of use or performance
    • Vietnamese: sự tiện lợi, dễ sử dụng
    • Example: The new software has a facility for automatic updates.
    • Related words: convenience, usability, accessibility

Note: The meanings of "facility" can be quite different depending on the context, so it's essential to understand the nuances of each definition to use the word correctly.
